text: André Berezin (born 28 April 1960) is a Brazilian rower. He competed in the men's coxed four event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Brazil Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from São Paulo
title: André Berezin
